name: No Control (Marnus)
description:
This Game is a 2D Platformer game where you are a ball that wants bread with jam so you move through dangerous obstacles where the floor is Slippery and lots of bouncy planes that you can jump on and bounce high. have fun 

This game was developed by Marnus Labuschagne 

Art, code,UI done by Marnus

music and sounds where found at:  www.Zapsplat.com
